label: ReactJS
description:
After learning AngularJS, ReactJS was a natural next step.

Since 2016 I started learning on my spare time, using blogs and podcasts as a learning source.

As an extra detail, this page is built with ReactJS/ES6.

label: AngularJS (1.5)
description:
Starting on 2015 I learned AngularJS during an analysis for a new development project.

I became the main Angular developer and helped train other developers and to build our first effort.

Since then, I've worked in multiple projects involving Angular, and its integration with other technologies like Java Portlets.
